name: delegation-health-check
description: Exercise delegate + cancel flow and verify task/delegation statuses.

steps.title: Start test delegation
steps.description: Create a small test task and delegate it to a safe agent; capture taskId/delegationId.

steps.title: Trigger cancel
steps.description: Call POST /api/delegate/{taskId}/cancel and confirm task status -> cancelled and active delegations -> cancelled.

steps.title: Report results
steps.description: Summarize statuses before/after cancel, any errors, and UI surfacing gaps.
